"defineSection" and "renderSection" Example

Body

Markdown Helpers: Includes and Blocks

Markdown "Include": Escaped

relative

Derive the relative path from one absolute path to another.

Parameters: string (the value to test against) Default: none

Usage:

[]()

Example:

<a href="dist/assets/css/styles.css"></a>

Renders to: 

<a href="../../dist/assets/css/styles.css"></a>

Markdown "Include": Un-escaped

relative

Derive the relative path from one absolute path to another.

Parameters: string (the value to test against) Default: none

Usage:

[]()

Example:

<a href="dist/assets/css/styles.css"></a>

Renders to: 

<a href="../../dist/assets/css/styles.css"></a>

Markdown Block

h1 Heading

h2 Heading

h3 Heading

h4 Heading

h5 Heading
h6 Heading

relative

Derive the relative path from one absolute path to another.

Parameters: string (the value to test against) Default: none

Usage:

[]()

Example:

<a href="dist/assets/css/styles.css"></a>

Renders to:
